channel.title: Add-Ons on eWeLink CUBE
channel.description: Recent content in Add-Ons on eWeLink CUBE

item.title: Node-red
item.description: Install and Run Go to the Docker menu and install Node-red, if it is not there, click the add button to add. Click the RUN button to run the Node-red, keep parameters default. Open the webUI of Node-red After running, click the ‘More info’ to go to its detail page. Click the ‘Show in new window’ button upper right to open its web console on a new tab. Install the ewelink-cube palette On the Node-red page, click the menu upper right, click ‘Manage palette’.
